document_data.name: Ahlmer
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ahlmer''' was the shopkeeper of [[Ahlmer's General Store]] in the [[Port District]] of [[Procampur]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|3}}

Ahlmer was formerly a thief. Although reformed, he was still in touch with the criminal underworld, such as it was in the law-abiding city.<ref>{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|2-3}}
